Por ello ahora desea mejorar su calidad de vida, con el arreglo de su casa. Pues sus hijos son todos unos profesionales y necesitan su espacio. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Nieves de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en mejorar el material con el que fue construido su casa, por otro más fuerte. Además de un cuarto prefabricado para el taller de su hijo, que es ingeniero civil.
texts.en:
Nieves, 45, is a courageous single mother. She lives with two of her four children, Jarol and Julissa, who she takes care of in her own house, located in the Chilca district.  Her smile shows her vitality. 

She grows products such as potatoes, olluco (root vegetable similar to potato) and lima beans, once a year.  As she wishes to have quality products, she is constantly looking after them, fertilizing and protecting them  She is thankful for farming, as it allowed her to support her children, and provide their daily food. But as these earnings are not steady, she decided to get into sewing, and she makes articles of clothing of every size and quality. 

She says she earns an average of 150 nuevos soles per week, but at Christmas, New Year's, and the Santiago agricultural festival, she gets better earnings. That is why she now wishes to improve her quality of life by repairing her house, since her children are all professionals and need their space. 

This is her second loan with MFP, and she is hoping for your contribution, so that she can make her plans a reality. Moreover, she promises to fulfil her instalment payments. In addition, she is grateful to be part of her association, because all the members are responsible people and very supportive. 

When she receives her loan, Nieves will use the money she has applied for, to improve the material that her house is constructed with, replacing it with another one that is stronger. In addition she will build a room using prefabricated materials, as a workshop for her son, who is a civil engineer.

loans.use: To buy construction materials for repairing her house, and to add a room using prefabricated material.

loans.name: Adjango

texts.fr:
Adjango est une femme âgé(e) de 32 ans. Elle est mariée å un  revendeur  avec 01 enfant âgé d’01an. Adjango travaille comme revendeuse de mèches et produits de beauté depuis  2009. Elle vend à ses clients à la maison après achat à Lomé.
Adjango a requis son second cycle de crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter des mèches, des produits de beauté et des articles scolaires.
Dans les prochaines années, Adjango voudrait augmenter son stock afin de mieux vendre pour ouvrir une boutique avec le bénéfice réalisé et  assurer l’éducation et le bien –être de la famille.
texts.en:
Adjango is a 32-year-old woman. She is married to a retailer with whom she has a 1-year-old child. Adjango has been working as a retailer of hair extensions and beauty supplies since 2009. She sells to her customers at home after buying her products in Lomé. 

Adjango requested her second loan cycle from WAGES in order to buy hair extensions, beauty products and school items. 

In the coming years, Adjango would like to increase her stock in order to increase sales and open a boutique with the earned profits/ She would also like to ensure the education and well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions, beauty products and school items.

loans.name: José Angel

texts.es: El señor José Ángel tiene 33 años, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. El trabaja en el área de bodega del departamento de infra estructura del ingenio san Antonio. El señor quiere mejorar su techo de su casa ya que es de teja y se humedece mucho que gotea y provoca goteras, el motivo del crédito es para la compra de zinc, clavos y perlines. Su mayor sueño siempre ha sido realizar mejoras para su vivienda pues siempre le ha querido dar a su familia lo mejor.
texts.en:
Señor José Ángel is 33 years old and has two children under the age of 18 in his care.  He works in a warehouse in the infrastructure department in the sugar refinery at San Antonio.  

The Señor wants to improve the roof of his home as it's made of tile and when it rains a lot, it drips and leaks.  The purpose of the loan is to purchase zinc sheets, nails, and supporting beams.

His biggest dream has always been to make improvements to his home, as he has always wanted to give his family the best life possible.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheeting, nails and supporting beams.

loans.name: Abba

texts.fr:
ABBA HABITE AU SENEGAL DANS LA REGION SUD AGE DE 35 ANS ENSEIGNANTS MARIE .IL A 3 ENFANTS ,2 SONT A L'ECOLE LE PLUS GRAND FAIT LE CM1 LE SECOND FAIT CI ET LE PLUS PETIT RESTE A LA MAISON AVEC SA MAMAN.AVEC CE CREDIT ABBA ACHETE DES FOURNITURES SCOLAIRE ET FRAIS D'INSCRIPTION DES ENFANTS.
ABBA FAIT UN BON ENCADREMENT DE SES ENFANTS POUR LEUR REUSSITE DANS L'AVENIR.
texts.en:
Abba is a 35-year-old teacher who is married and lives in southern Senegal. He is the father of 3 children, 2 of whom attend elementary school. The eldest is in fourth grade and the middle child in second grade. The youngest child stays at home with his mother.

Abba is requesting this loan so that he can buy school supplies and pay his children's school enrolment fees. He wants to give his children a good foundation for a successful future.

loans.use: to buy school supplies and pay enrolment fees.

loans.name: Zucy Emperatriz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Zucy Emperatriz; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de lencería, ella vende ropas interiores para mujeres y varones, la socia tiene una tienda que trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de lencería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar polos, truzas y medias al por mayor. 

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA” communal bank.  The bank is located in Cusco district, which is part of the department of Cusco and province of Cusco.

The member is Señora Zucy Emperatriz.  She is 50 years old and unmarried.  The member combines her daily activities with her business selling lingerie.  She sells underwear for men and women.  She has a store where she works from 9 a.m. till 7 p.m., and by means of this business the member has been able to move her children ahead in life.

The member would like to expand and improve her lingerie business.  She is requesting the loan to purchase polo-shirts, briefs and stockings at wholesale.

The member is happy about the loan, and agrees to comply with her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase polo-shirts, briefs, and stockings at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a room for her kitchen.

loans.name: José Salvador

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 43 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y tres hijos.

Él tiene 20 años de dedicarse a la pesca, fue su papá quien le enseño esta actividad, ya que era un pescador. También José se dedica a la albañilería desde hace 10 años, esta actividad la aprendió de su tío.

Los materiales que necesita, para la pesca es el combustible y este lo compra en una ciudad de la zona oriental del país, para la albañilería son los clientes quienes compran los materiales, ya que él trabaja por contrato.

José solicita un préstamo a Fundación campo, para  comprar ladrillo de piso, cemento y arena, para mejorar su vivienda. Puesto que con su esfuerzo y el apoyo de Fundación campo ha construido su casa. José mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia al brindarles una vivienda más confortable.

José desea sobre todo, proporcionales a sus hijos el estudio, y más que dos de ellos ya están en bachillerato.
texts.en:
José, 43, lives with his spouse and three children.  He’s been a fisherman for 20 years; his father taught him this occupation since he was a fisherman too.  José has also been working as a bricklayer for ten years; he learned this occupation from his uncle.

The supplies he needs for fishing is fuel which he buys in a city in the east of the country; for the bricklaying work the customers provide the materials since he works on contract.

José is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to buy floor tiles, cement and sand to do some home improvements because thanks to his efforts and support from Fundación Campo he’s managed to build his house.  José will improve his family’s quality of life providing a more comfortable dwelling for them.

José wants, above all, to provide education for his children more so since two of them are already in high school.

loans.use: to buy floor tiles, cement and sand to do home improvements.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr:
Akouvi est une femme  âgé(e) de 42 ans. Elle est mariée å un  transitaire. Elle a 03 enfants tous scolarisés. L’ainé est âgé de 18ans et le dernier de 06 ans.
Akouvi travaille comme revendeuse de mais et d’huile d’arachide depuis 1992. Elle vend dans une boutique à toutes personnes intéressées par ses marchandises.
Elle a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter plus de marchandises. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Elle voudrait agrandir son stock afin de mieux répondre à la population. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
Akouvi is a 42-year-old woman.  She is married to a shipping worker.  She has three children, all of whom are in school.  The oldest is 18 years old, and the youngest is 6 years old.  

Akouvi has been working as a retailer of maize and peanut oil since 1992.  She sells from a shop to all people interested in her goods.  She requested her second loan from WAGES so that she can could more goods. She wants to reinvest in her business. 

In the coming years, she would like to grow her stock so she can better respond to the population.  She says that with the profits she anticipates improving the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase maize and peanut oil for her business.

loans.name: Juboo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  Juboo du Banc Villageois de a été crée depuis son inauguration .Il est composé de 15 femmes issues d'un même village et d'un meme groupement. Elles se sont organisées en groupe par affinité et par voisinage .
l'activité principal pratiquée dans cette localité reste le commerce de céréales.
Madame Sophie responsable du  groupe debout à droite de la photo est une femme mariée , mère de 6 enfants, et âgée de 42 ans.
Elle fait partie des membres fondatrices du Banc villageois, elle pratique le commerce de détails dans la vente de céréales , une activité qu elle maîtrise pour l'avoir pratiqué depuis longtemps au niveau du petit marché de son village.
Avec son nouveau crédit elle va acheter 5 sacs de mil 4 sacs d'arachides et 3 sacs de mais qu elle va revendre.
Ses bénéfices lui permettront d'appuyer son mari dans la gestion de la famille en achetant du riz de l'huile et des ordonnances pour ses enfants en cas de maladie.
texts.en:
The Juboo group was created at the inauguration of the Banc Villageois it belongs to. The group is composed of 15 women living in the same village and   in the same neighborhood. They are friends and neighbors who have formed a group together. The main business activity in this area is selling cereals.
Mrs. Sophie, the group’s leader, standing to the far right in the photo and raising her hand, is married and the mother of six children. She is 42 years old. She is one of the founding members of Banc Villageois. She retails cereals,  a business she masters well, having had a long experience in selling at the small market of her village. With her new loan, she will purchase five bags of millet, four bags of peanuts [ground nuts] and three bags of corn, which she will resell.
Her revenues allow her to help her husband support their family, paying for rice and vegetable oil as well as  medications when her children are ill.

loans.use: to buy cereals for resale in her village

loans.name: Julia Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia Marina; ella tiene 62 años de edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de manualidades, ella tiene una tienda donde vende todo tipo de manualidades como muñecas, portavasos y adornos, la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de manualidades. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como lana, cartulinas, hilos y palitos de tejer.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA” communal bank.  The bank is located in Cusco district, which is part of the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Julia Marina. She is 62 years old, and is married with five children.  The member combines her daily activities with her business selling handicrafts.  She has a store where she sells all kinds of handicrafts, such as dolls, coasters, and decorations.  The member works from 9 a.m. through 6 p.m, and by means of this business the member has been able to move her children ahead in life. 

The member would like to expand and improve her business selling handicrafts.  She is requesting the loan to purchase materials such as wool, card, yarn, and knitting needles.

The member is happy about the loan and commits to complying with her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as wool, card, yarn and knitting needles.

loans.name: Mariuska  Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mariuska Marina; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de manualidades, ella hace manualidades y luego lo vende en forma independiente y también tiene un trabajo como docente en la universidad, por medio de este negocio y trabajo la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de manualidades. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como hilos y lanas para hacer las manualidades.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Señor de Tete Caca communal bank, located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member, Mariuska Marina, is 29 years old and married with one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling handicrafts.  She makes crafts and later sells them independently.  She also has a job teaching in the university.  By means of this business and job Mariuska Marina gets her child ahead.  She wants to expand and improve her handicraft business.

She is requesting the loan to buy materials such as thread and wool to make the handicrafts.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to buy materials such as thread and wool to make handicrafts.

loans.name: Juvina

texts.es: Juvina, de 50 años es una mujer admirable. Hace 22 años enviudó del que fue su esposo, Pedro. Ambos tuvieron 2 hijos. Jessica y Irania, con los que vive en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Usibamba. Sola tuvo que sacar adelante a sus hijas, su principal actividad es la costura, con la confección de faldas, mandiles y fustanes (vestimenta típica), a los pobladores de su localidad, quien conocen la destreza de Juvina. Cuenta que llega a confeccionar de 6 a 8 prendas al día, donde obtiene una ganancia neta de 30 nuevos soles por falda. Pero como es una mujer del campo, también se dedica a la ganadería con la crianza de 8 vacas, de las cueles saca un promedio de 15 litros diarios, que aprovecha muy bien, pues vende a los acopiadores de leche que visitan su casa constantemente. Como le va muy bien en su negocio, desea mejorar la calidad de sus costuras y aumentar su ganado, por ello trabaja muy duro, todos los días. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los ganaderos” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Juvina de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un becerro y comida balanceada para sus vacas.
texts.en:
Juvina, age 50, is an admirable woman. She became a widow at the age of 22 after the death of her husband, Pedro. They had 2 children, Jessica and Irania with whom she lives in her own house located in the small village of Usibamba. On her own, she has had to get ahead with her two daughters. Her main business is sewing embroidered skirts (traditional clothing) for people in her community, who are familiar with Juvina’s artistry. She says that she can make 6 to 8 garments a day and can obtain net earnings of 30 new soles per skirt.

In addition, as a woman of the countryside, she is also engaged in raising 8 cows, from which she gets an average of 15 liters of milk daily. This benefits her a lot since she sells to milk merchants who visit her house constantly.

Her business is doing well, and she wants to improve the quality of her dressmaking. That’s why she works very hard every day.

She belongs to the “Los Ganaderos “ (Cattleraisers) communal bank. This is her first loan with MFP, and she hopes that, through this collaboration, she will be able to achieve her plans. In addition, she promises to fulfill the payment of her installments. She is thankful to be a part of her communal bank because all its members are very responsible and supportive persons. Juvina receives their support. She will invest the money applied for in the purchase of a calf and balanced feed for her cows.

loans.use: to purchase a calf and balanced feed for her cows.

loans.name: Messan

texts.fr:
Messan est un homme âgé de 32 ans. Il est marié å une  coiffeuse et ensemble ils ont 02 enfants. Un va à l’école. Le premier a 06ans et le dernier 02ans.
Messan travaille comme éleveur de poules depuis 2010. Il sert ses clients à la maison et n’ a aucune difficulté dans l’exercice de son activité.
Messan a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des nourriture pour pondeuse. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Messan voudrait élargir son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, Il prévoit de prendre soin de la famille.
texts.en:
Messan is a 32-year-old man. He is married to a hairdresser and together they have two children. One goes to school. The children are six and two years old.

Messan has been working as a poultry farmer since 2010. He serves his customers from his home and has no problems managing his business.

Messan is requesting his first loan from WAGES to buy chicken feed for laying hens. He wants to reinvest in the business.

In coming years, Messan would like to expand his business. He states that with the profits he intends to take care of his family.

loans.use: Buy chicken feed for laying hens

loans.name: Zoilo Leoncio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Zoilo Leoncio; el tiene 36 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos agroindustriales como harinas, mermeladas y manjares, el socio también se dedica al trabajo en un empresa pública, por medio de este trabajo y este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de productos agroindustriales. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar los productos agroindustriales como frutas y azúcar al por mayor.                    
                         
 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Señor de Tete Caca communal bank, located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member, Zoilo Leoncio, is 36 years old and married with three children.  He alternates his daily activities with his business selling agroindustrial products such as flour, marmalade, and delicacies.  He also works in a public company.  By means of this job and this business he gets his children ahead.  He wants to expand and improve his business selling agroindustrial products.

Zoilo Leoncio is requesting the loan to buy ingredients to make agroindustrial products such as fruit and sugar wholesale.

He is happy about the loan and is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make agroindustrial products such as fruit and sugar wholesale.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: Alejandro, de 53 años es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de Flora, su esposa desde hace 10 años. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero solo viven con 2 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Aymara.  Todas las mañanas se levanta para ocuparse de las actividades del día, pues es un hombre con múltiples ocupaciones. Durante las mañanas sale a trabajar como albañil, en trabajos eventuales todo depende de los contratos que negocia, cuenta que gana 60 nuevos soles diarios en el mejor de los días. Pero como, no es un trabajo estable, comparte su tiempo con la agricultura, la actividad que aprendió desde niño. Sus principales sembríos constan de tubérculos como papa, olluco, maca y mashua, los que vende en cada cosecha al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Huancayo, por más de 20 años, además su esposa lo ayuda con el cuidado de sus vacas, ovejas y caballos a los que enseba para luego venderlos a un mayor precio. Ahora desea mejorar sus ingresos, ya que quiere brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “los pinos” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Alejandro de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa.
texts.en:
53-year-old Alejandro is a responsible man.  He lives together with Flora, his wife of 10 years.  The couple have 5 children and live with two of them in their own home which is located in the small village of Aymara.

Every morning, Alejandro gets up to take care of his day's work as he is a man with multiple occupations.  During the mornings, he goes out to work as a builder.  His work in this field depends on the contracts that he negotiates.  He tells us that he earns 60 soles a day on his best days.  However, as this is not a stable job, he also spends time farming.  This is a business that he learned when he was a boy.  His main crops are tubers such as potatoes, olluca, maca and mashua (native tubers).  At harvest time he sells his produce in the wholesale market in the city of Huancayo.  He has been doing this for more than 20 years.  In addition, his wife helps him to take care of their cows, sheep and horses which they fatten up and then sell at a higher price.  

Alejandro would now like to improve his income as he would like to provide his children with a good education.  He belongs to the 'Los Pinos' community bank and this is his first loan from MFP.  He hopes to receive your cooperation so that he can realize his plans.  For his part, he pledges to make his repayments on time.  Alejandro enjoys being a member of his association because all of the members are responsible and very supportive people.  With your support, he will invest the money he has requested in buying natural fertilizers to spread over his potato crops.

loans.use: to buy a sack of natural fertilizers

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
L. socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR D. TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a L. provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

L. socia es L. Sra. Rosa; elL. tiene 52años D. edad y es viuda y tiene 4 hijos; L. socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. gaseosas y aguas minerales, elL. tiene un pequeño puesto en un hospedaje donD. trabaja desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio D. este negocio L. socia saca adelante a sus hijos, L. socia quiere ampliar el negocio D. venta D. gaseosas y aguas minerales. L. socia solicita el préstamo para comprar gaseosas y aguas minerales al por mayor.
                                                                                    
 L. socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the “SEÑOR D. TETE CACA” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Rosa is 52 years old, widowed, and has four children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling soda and mineral water.  She has a small stall in a guest house where she works from 8.00am to 7.00pm.  Through this business, she provides for her children.  Rosa would like to expand her business selling soda and mineral water.  She is requesting this loan to buy soda and mineral water wholesale.

Rosa is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy soda and mineral water wholesale

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.es: Maria Ines tiene 57 años, su actividad es la venta y destace de cerdo. Hace más de 18 años que tiene este medio de vida, dio inicio a este negocio ante la falta de trabajo que aqueja a nuestro país. Ella desea invertir este crédito en la compra de cerdos, ella sale a buscar sus productos a las diferentes zonas de su comarca. Uno de sus mayores desafíos ha sido ha sido su salud, pues tiene que salir a buscar los cerdos y pagar por el transporte para trasladarlo hasta su vivienda. Su sueño siempre ha sido mantener su negocio y tener buena salud.
texts.en:
María Inés is 57 years old.  Her job is selling and butchering pigs.  She has had this means of support for more than 18 years.  She began this business when faced with the lack of work that afflicts our country.  She goes looking for her products to the different areas of her region.  One of her biggest challenges has been her health, since she has to go looking for the pigs and pay for transporting them to her home.  

María Inés wants to invest this loan in buying pigs.  Her  dream has always been to keep her business and have good health.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients such as meat, chicken, and bread wholesale, to make refreshments.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es: Edwin, de 26 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive desde hace 2 años con Erika, su esposa. Ambos tienen una hija, Mayumi a la que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de Huancayo. Su padre murió cuando era apenas un niño, tiene pocos recuerdos de él. Desde entonces se forjó en la agricultura sembrando papa y olluco en grandes cantidades. Lo que le gusta es la temporada de cosecha, donde obtienen buenas ganancias. Pero como conciente que solamente es un vez al año, también se dedica al trasporte de frutas en todo el país, viaja un promedio de 2 veces por semana, ahí percibe un sueldo de 150 soles por lugar visitado. Además su esposa trabaja en la confección de colchones de paja, los que vende en las diferentes ferias de la ciudad de Huancayo. En julio, donde es la temporada donde más vende, Edwin, apoya por completo en esta labor así aprovechan la demanda. Ahora los dos desean mejorar sus ingresos, por lo que trabajaran con mayor empeño. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “los pinos” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Edwin de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa.
texts.en:
Edwin, 26, is a hardworking man.  He has lived with his wife Erika for two years.  Together they have a daughter, Mayumi, and care for her in their own home in the city of Huancayo.  His father died when Edwin was just a little boy; he has few memories of him.  Since then he worked in agriculture cultivating potatoes and olluco [a root vegetable] in large quantities.

What he likes about his work is the harvest season, when he gets good profits.  But as he allows, it is only once a year, so he also works transporting fruit throughout the country, traveling an average of twice a week, for which he receives a salary of 150 PEN for each place visited.  Also, his wife works making straw cushions, which she sells in the various markets in the city of Huancayo.  In July, the season in which she sells the most, Edwin supports her work completely so they make the most of the demand.  Now the two of them want to improve their income, for which they will work with greater determination.

Edwin belongs to the Los Pinos solidarity group, and this is his first loan with MFP, so he hopes for your collaboration so he can realize his plans.  On the other hand, he promises to make his payments.  Also, he likes being part of his group because all the members are responsible and very supportive people.

When he receives his support, Edwin will invest the requested money in buying natural fertilizer to spread on his potato fields.

loans.use: to buy bags of natural fertilizer.

loans.name: Marizela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marizela; ella tiene 32 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como secretaria y también es asesora de ventas de inmuebles, la socia por medio de este trabajo saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere mejorar en su trabajo como secretaria y asesora de ventas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar un artefacto para su casa.      
                                       
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Sra. Marizela is a member of the Communal Bank “Señor de Tete Caca” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 32 years old, single, and has one child. Marizela divides her time between her daily activities and her job as a secretary. She is also a real estate sales agent. Through these jobs, she is able to help her son move forward. Marizela wants to improve in her work as a secretary and as a sales agent. She is requesting a loan to buy an appliance for her home.

Marizela is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy an appliance for her home.

loans.name: Yeggo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité yeggo a été crée depuis la fondation du Banc villageois.
Il est composé de 15 femmes qui sont toutes issues du même village et d un même groupement.
Pour montrer leur affinité elles ont donné au groupe le nom "entente" suite à leur  bon voisinage.
Madame Anthia responsable de ce groupe debout à droite de la photo est mère de famille marié âge de 43 ans .
Elle est mère de 3 enfants et n'a aucun enfant en charge, elle est membre du banc villageois depuis sa création.
Son activité reste le commerce de détails dans la vente de produits divers.
Avec son  nouveau prêt elle va acheter 4 sacs de mil  3 sacs d arachides,2 sacs mais et 2 paquets savons.
Ses bénéfices lui permettront de participer dans la prise en charge de sa famille ( achats riz huile vêtements, médicaments ...)
texts.en:
The solidarity group Yeggo was created at the same time as the Banc Villageois.
It is made up of 15 women who all come from the same village and the same group.
To show their affinity, they have given the group the name “agreement” because of their good relationships.

Madame Anthia, the leader of this group who is standing to the right in the photo, is 43 years old, married and a mother. 
She is the mother of three children but does not have any of them in her care.  She has been a member of the Banc Villageois since it was created.
She is a retail merchant who sells various products. 
With her new loan she will buy four sacks of millet, three sacks of peanuts, two sacks of corn and two packs of soap.
Her profits will allow her to contribute to meeting the family’s needs by buying rice, oil, clothing, medicine, etc.

loans.use: to buy millet, peanuts, corn and soap.

loans.name: Bruno

texts.es: Bruno comerciante, casado, sus planes mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda, ampliar el negocio vender en mayores cantidades, con el préstamo anterior invirtió en productos que sus clientela requerían y solicitaba. En ámbito familia genero mayores comodidades económicas. Junto a su esposa administran la pulpería. Con este préstamo que solicitad será invertirlo en la compra de mercadería como: aceitunas, granos básicos (arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite), bebidas (gaseosas, jugos, energéticas), enlatados (maíz, pitihuá, salchichas, atún, jamón prensado), carnes, verduras, fruta, lácteos entre otros productos. Ofreciéndoles a sus clientes mayores variedades también obteniendo ganancias que serán de gran beneficio para la familia.
texts.en:
Bruno is a merchant who is married. His plans include improving the infrastructure of his home and expanding his business so that he can sell in larger quantities. With his previous loan, he invested in products that his customers requested and needed. At home, his family is in a better financial state. He and his wife manage their store together.

With this loan request, Bruno will invest in the purchase of merchandise such as olives, basic goods (rice, beans, sugar, and oil), beverages (sodas, juices, and energy drinks), canned goods (corn, dragon fruit, sausages, tuna, and pressed ham), meats, vegetables, fruit, dairy products, and other items. By offering his customers more variety, Bruno will generate income that will greatly benefit his family.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia, de 22 años es una mujer luchadora. Pues vive en compañía de su mamá Reina y su hijas Idania a la que cuida sola; en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Aymará. Cuando apenas tenía 2 años falleció su papá, desde entonces su vida no fue muy sencilla. Pues tenía que apoyar a su mamá. Por lo que aprendió de ella el cuidado de animales. Ahora se dedica a la compra y venta de ovejas y cerdos, siempre tiene 20 ejemplares de las que poco a poco va incrementando y vendiendo en la feria agropecuaria de cotocoto, donde obtiene buenas ganancias; pues es conocida entre los comerciantes. Asimismo comparte su actividad con la siembra de tubérculos como: papa, olluco, mashua y oca, los cuales siembra en sus 2 terrenos productivos. Con la ganancia que obtiene, compra los alimentos de sus animales, como también comida balanceada para sus cerdos. Con ello espera obtener unos animales de calidad. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los pinos” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Sonia, de recibir su apoyo invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa y alfalfa.
texts.en:
22-year-old Sonia is a tenacious woman.  She lives with her mom, Reina, and her daughter, Idania, who she cares for alone in their own home, which is located in the small village of Aymará.  When she was barely 2 years old her dad died.  From then on, Sonia's life wasn't very simple as she had to support her mom.  She learned how to care for animals from her mom.  Now her business is buying and selling sheep and pigs.  She always has 20 animals and she is gradually increasing this number.  She sells her animals in the livestock market in Cotocoto where she makes good profits as she is well known amongst the traders.  In addition to this work, Sonia also grows tubers such as potatoes, olluco, mashua and oca (native tubers).  She grows these on her two plots of farmland.  She uses the profits that she makes to buy feed for her animals.  She also buys nutritionally-balanced feed for her pigs.  She does this in the hope of obtaining good-quality animals.

Sonia belongs to the 'Los Pinos' community bank and this is her first loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can realize her plans.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  Sonia enjoys being a member of her bank because all the members are responsible and very supportive people.  With your support, Sonia will invest the money she has requested in buying natural fertilizers to spread over her potato and alfalfa crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Mercedes Alicia

texts.es:
Mercedes de 40 años, decidió dedicarse a la venta de comida ya que en el sector en el que vive es muy poblado y no hay restaurants.

Lo realiza solo todos los días sin horarios fijos. El único problema que se le presenta es el mal clima. 
Está casada pero vive independientemente de su esposo, tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 14 años que estudian en colegio fiscal. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere contruir mejor su casa por tal motivo quiere el prestamo para comprar cemento, arena y bloques. Su meta es poder comprar más mesas y sillas para así poder agrandar mas su negocio.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 40 years old.  She decided to sell food because there are many people who live in her neighborhood, but there are no restaurants.  Mercedes works every day, but without a set schedule.  The only problem that she must deal with is bad weather.  

Mercedes is married, but lives independently from her husband.  She has two children, age 17 and 14, who attend a public school.  

She has many goals for her business, which is why she wants to build a better home. With this loan she will buy cement, sand and blocks. Her goal is to buy more tables and chairs so that she can expand her business even more.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, blocks, and paint.

loans.name: Rosaida

texts.es: Rosaida, de 26 años es una mujer ejemplar. Vive en compañía de su mamá Cimena, su papá Silvestre y sus 2 hermanos a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Aymará. A pesar de su edad, ella no tiene compromisos; pues su único pensamiento se centra en ayudar a sus padres y hermanos. Es así que trabaja sin descanso en el cuidado de sus sembríos de tubérculos como: papa, olluco, oca y mashua, también habas y alverja. Toda una vida la dedicó a la agricultura, gracias a su esfuerzo. Ahora tiene 7 parcelas donde distribuye sus sembríos de acuerdo a la temporada. Lo que le agrada es ver como los campos verdes comienzan a dar fruto, por eso todos los días sin descanso, cuida de ellos. Ahora desea mejorar su producción y así tener excelentes ganancias, con las que podrá brindarles a sus hermanos una mejor calidad de vida. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los pinos” y este es el primer préstamo con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Rosaida de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para su sembrío de papa de la variedad “blanca”.
texts.en:
26-year-old Rosaida is an exemplary woman.  She lives together with her mom Cimena, her dad Silvestre, and her two siblings who she cares for in their own home which is located in the small village of Aymará.  In spite of her age, Rosaida doesn't have commitments.  Her only thoughts are of helping her parents and siblings.  For this reason, she works without rest, caring for her crops.  She grows tubers such as potatoes, olluco, oca and mashua (native tubers).  She also grows beans and peas.  Rosaida has spent her whole life farming.  Thanks to her efforts, she now has 7 plots of land where she grows her crops according to the season.  What she enjoys is seeing how the green fields start to bear fruit and so she cares for her crops every day without rest.  Right now, she would like to improve her production and thereby make excellent profits with which she will be able to provide her siblings with a better quality of life.

Rosaida belongs to the 'Los Pinos' community bank and this is her first loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can realize her plans.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  She enjoys being a member of her community bank because all the members are responsible and very supportive people.  With your support, Rosaida will invest the money she has requested in buying natural fertilizers for her 'blanca'-variety potato crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es:
La señora Juana Maria comenta que necesita remodelar dos cuartos de madera que tiene y están en malas condiciones, quiere anticipar con la remodelación antes de que llegue la temporada de inverno.
Doña Juana Maria es empleada desde hace dos años en una maquiladora desempeñándose como trabajadora de producción, con el ingreso que recibe ha podido apoyar a sus papas con los gastos familiares y con el cual planea pagar el crédito. 
Desea la seguridad y protección de sus padres y que puedan evitar enfermedades.
texts.en:
Sra. Juana Maria says that she needs to renovate two rooms in her wooden house that are in bad condition. She wants to complete the renovations before the winter season arrives.

Doña Juana Maria has been employed for two years at a factory, where she works on a production line. The income that she earns enables her to help her parents with the family expenses and she will use some of that money to repay this loan.

Juana Maria desires to have security and protection for her parents so that they can avoid getting sick.

loans.use: to replace the ceiling on two rooms of her house.

loans.name: Vilma Abigail

texts.es:
La señora Vilma tiene 40 años D. edad, es acompañada con dos hijos.

Ella vive con sus dos hijos, ya que su compañero D. vida emigro a otro país. Vilma tiene 4 años D. dedicarse a la venta D. frutas y refrescos que ella misma prepara. Los productos que necesita los adquiere en el mercado D. una ciudad del oriente del país.

Vilma solicita el préstamo para, construir una habitación para sus hijos, ya que la vivienda es pequeña, y con la habitación adicional sus hijos tendrían privacidad, espacio para tener sus cosas y desarrollar sus tareas escolares. Así su vivienda será más confortable. Vilma desea tener su propia habitación y brindarles el estudio a sus hijos y que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Vilma is 40 years old. She has a partner and two children.

She lives with her two children as her life partner emigrated abroad. Vilma has spent four years selling fruit and soft drinks that she prepares herself. She acquires the products she needs at a market in a city in the east of the country. 

Vilma is applying for a loan to build a bedroom for her children, since their house is small. With the additional room, her children would have privacy, and space to keep their things and to do their homework. This will make their home more comfortable. Vilma would like to have her own room and to be able to allow her children to study so they can become professionals.

loans.use: to build a bedroom for her children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more water by the sack and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Leonza Marina

texts.es: Leonza Marina tiene 59 años, ella tiene un negocio que es la venta de mercadería en general pues su negocio es de manera ambulante de esta forma obtiene nuevos clientes para su negocio. Hace más de 14 años que trabaja por cuenta propia, sin embargo ha sido poco a poco que ha comprado una variedad de productos para ofrecer la mayoría de sus clientes siempre le solicitan variedad con sus productos, buscando de esta manera como incrementar sus ingresos. Es por eso que este crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, polvos, lápiz labial, cremas, tratamientos entre otros. Su sueño siempre ha sido agrandar más su negocio para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Leonza Marina is 59 years old and has a business selling general merchandise. She works as a traveling merchant so that she can obtain new customers for her business. Leonza has worked in her own business for more than 14 years. Gradually over time, she has been able to buy a variety of products to offer to most of her customers since they are requesting different items. Working in this manner helps her to increase her earnings.

For this reason, Leonza is requesting a loan to buy trousers, shirts, powders, lip pencils, crèmes, treatments, and other products. Her dream has always been to expand her business even more so that she provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, powders, lip pencils, crèmes, treatments, and other products.

loans.name: Adolfo

texts.es: Adolfo, de 53 años es un hombre ejemplar. Vive en compañía de Elorica, su esposa desde hace 20 años. Ambos tienen un hijo: José Luis al que cuidan con mucho amor y cariño en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Usibamba. Toda su vida trabajó en la agricultura y ganadería, desde entonces no descanso hasta comprar su propio auto. Cuenta que gracias a las 8 vacas que posee, pudo ahorrar  lo suficiente, pues le otorgan buen precio en la fábrica de producción de queso llamado “usibambinito”, donde vende la leche que produce su ganado, Cuenta que produce un promedio de 30 a 32 litros al día. Además siembra diversos productos como papa, habas, alverja y olluco. De los que en la actualidad solo realiza para consumo propio. Pero el dinero de sus ganancias, le ayudó para comprar su auto, con lo que trabaja como taxista, en el trasporte público. Ahora desea mejorar la calidad de sus vacas, para poder aumentar su ganado y así tener más ingresos. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “los ganaderos” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Adolfo, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un toro y si le alcanza comprará avena para el alimento de sus vacas.
texts.en:
Adolfo, 53, is an exemplary man. He lives with Elorica, his wife of 20 years. They have a son, José Luis, whom they raised with much love and affection in their own home, located in the rural community of Usibamba. 

Adolfo worked all his life in agriculture and cattle raising. During that time, he did not rest until he bought his own automobile. He notes that, thanks to the eight cows he owns, he was able to save up enough money because of the good price he receives from a factory producing the cheese called “usibambinito,” where he sells the milk produced by his cows. He says that he produces on average 30 to 32 liters a day. In addition, he cultivates various crops such as potatoes, broad beans, green peas and olluco (a root crop). Currently he produces these crops for his own consumption. However the money from his profits helped him buy his auto, with which he works as a taxi driver in public transportation. Now he wants to improve the quality of his cows in order to increase his cattle and earn more income.

He belongs to “Los Ganaderos” communal bank and this is his first loan with MFP, where he looks forward to their collaboration so that he can concretize his plans. He promises to make his payments on time. As well, he is pleased to be a part of the communal bank because all the members are responsible and very supportive people. Upon receiving your support, Adolfo will invest the money in the purchase of a bull and, if he has enough, he will also buy oats to feed his cows.

loans.use: to buy a bull and oats as fodder for his cows.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es: Aurelia, de 34 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive con Callo, su esposo desde hace 13 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Aymará. Como buena mujer del campo, ella siembra diversos tubérculos como: papa, olluco y mashua, los cuales cuida constantemente, no puede ocupar todo su tiempo; pues también se dedica al tejido de chompas a base de lana, según cuenta realiza un promedio de 6 ejemplares al mes, ganando 40 soles por cada una, pues invierte un promedio de 10 a 20 soles por ovillo, “me gusta tejer es mi pasatiempo”, afirma. Pero como es hábil y creativa también borda faldas típicas en el mes de agosto donde se realiza la festividad agrícola llamada “santiago”; ahí obtiene una ganancia de mil soles por ese mes. Pero como tiene muchos gastos, su esposo le ayuda trabajando como cargador de sacos en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Huancayo. Donde tiene buenas ganancias. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los pinos” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Aurelia, de recibir su apoyo invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
Aurela, 34, is a hardworking woman.  She lives with Callo, her husband of 13 years. They have three children they are raising in their own home, located in the rural settlement of Aymará. As a good country woman, she plants various root crops such as potatoes, olluco and mashua, which she constantly tends, however she cannot spend all her time on them. She also knits woolen sweaters. She notes that she produces on average six sweaters a month, earning 40 soles for each one and she invests on average from 10 to 20 soles for a ball of yarn.  “I enjoy knitting, it is my hobby”, she states.

However, as she is skillful and creative, she also embroiders traditional skirts in the month of August when the agricultural festival called “Santiago” is held; there she earns an income of 1,000 soles for the month. Moreover, as she has many expenses, her husband helps her by working as a bag loader in the wholesale market in Huancayo city, where he earns a good salary.

Aurelia belongs to Los Pinos communal bank and this is her first loan with MFP, where she awaits your collaboration in order to be able to concretize her plans. She promises to meet all of her payments on time. As well she likes being part of her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and very supportive people. Upon receiving your support, she will invest the money in the purchase of natural fertilizer to spread on her potato plants.

loans.use: to buy sacks of natural fertilizer.

loans.name: Ponciano

texts.es: Ponciano, de 50 años es un hombre admirable. Hace 3 años que falleció su esposa Olimpia, con quien tubo 8 hijos. Pero solo vive con 2 de ellos en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Aymara. Criar solo a sus hijos es muy difícil. Pero sabe que el esfuerzo será recompensado, con ese espíritu todas las mañanas se dirige a sus 9 parcelas de terreno productivo, donde siembra tubérculos en su variedad de papa, mashua, olluco y oca. Le va muy bien en su trabajo, pues es reconocido entre los comerciantes del mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Huancayo, quienes por más de 30 años vienen comprando los productos que produce. Pero como buen hombre del campo, también cría animales como vacas, ovejas, toros y caballos. Cuenta que el año pasado su toro sufrió una enfermedad incurable, por lo que tuvo que sacrificarlo, su animal le ayudaba en el arado de la tierra y a realizar servicio a otras personas, quienes le pagaban 100 soles diarios por el trabajo. Ahora desea retomar su antigua actividad, con la compra de un ejemplar nuevo. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “los pinos” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Ponciano de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un toro para comenzar con el arado de la tierra.
texts.en: Ponciano, 50, is a good man.  His wife, with whom he had 8 children, died 3 years ago.  Two of their children are still living at home in Aymara and taking care of them alone is difficult.  Ponciano knows the value of hard work, though, so he gets up every morning to farm his land.  He grows tuber crops common to this area: potatoes, mashua, olluco and oca.  He is a careful farmer, something well known by the wholesale merchants in Huancayo who have been buying his crops for more than 30 years.  Like every good farmer in this area, Ponciano also raises livestock: cows, sheep, bulls and horses.  He tells us that his bull became so ill last year that he had to slaughter it.  He used the bull for plowing and even rented it to neighbors for 100 soles a day.  He wants to buy a new bull to help on the farm and to rent.  Ponciano belongs to the Los Pinos community bank and this is his first MFP loan.  He hopes that your help will allow him to follow through on his plan.  He, in turn, is committed to repaying the loan on time.  He says, too, that he likes his community bank because the members are responsible and supportive.  With your help, Ponciano will buy a bull that he will use to plow his fields.

loans.use: to buy a bull for livestock business.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita tiene 62 años, vive en su casa propia, Ella se dedica a la venta y destace de cerdo. Como es una mujer muy emprendedora para el futuro tiene pensado mejorar su actividad. Ella tiene tiempo de trabajar con Fundación y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente como siempre ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Margarita tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de cerdos.
texts.en: Margarita, 62, owns the house where she lives.  She raises and sells pigs for a living.  She is an enterprising woman and plans to expand the business.  Margarita has worked with Fundacion for some time and she promises to repay this loan in the agreed-upon time.  She is grateful for the loan and doesn't want to let down the people who are responsible for helping her to continue to support herself.  Margarita will use this loan to buy pigs for her livestock business.

loans.use: to buy pigs for her livestock business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy natural remedies.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr:
Akossiwa est une femme  âgé(e) de 31 ans. Elle est mariée à un chauffeur et eurent ensemble 03 enfants. Deux d’entre eux sont scolarisés. L’ainé a 07ans et le dernier  03ans.
Akossiwa travaille comme revendeuse de chaussures, d’assiettes et des produits cosmétiques  depuis 1999. Elle vend de façon ambulante à ses clients. Sa difficulté est la mévente. Une personne l’aide dans l’exercice de son activité.
Akossiwa a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des assiettes, des produits cométiques et des chaussures. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Akossiwa voudrait développer l’activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit assurer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
Akossiwa is a 31-year-old woman. She is married to a driver and they have three children together. Two of the children are in school. The oldest is 7 and the youngest is 3.
Akossiwa has worked as a retailer of shoes, plates, and cosmetics since 1999. She sells her products door-to-door to her customers. Her main challenge is a slump in sales. One person helps her with her business.
Akossiwa has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy plates, cosmetics, and shoes. She wants to reinvest in her business.
In the coming years, Akossiwa would like to develop her business. She says that with the profits, she intends to provide her family with a good standard of living.

loans.use: To buy shoes, plates, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron for making farm tools.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia, de 25 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de Juan, su esposo desde hace 6 años. Ambos tienen un hijo: Nilver. Pero cuidan también de su sobrina Melina, pues su mamá falleció cuando apenas era una bebe. Juntos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Aymara. Su corazón es grande, pues su mayor tesoro es la humildad y el amor por las personas. Aunque su sobrina no es su hija, ella la cuida como tal. Por el futuro de los suyos, ella trabaja en la agricultura, sembrando tubérculos como papa, olluco, oca y mashua. Los cuales cuida en sus 10 parcelas de terreno productivo. Lo que más le gusta es pasar su tiempo en el campo, como también viajar a la ciudad de Huancayo, donde vende sus cosechas. Paralelo a ese trabajo también se dedica a la crianza de animales como 6  vacas y 48 ovejas. Cuenta que vende la leche que produce su ganado por litros, como la carne de carnero en la feria de los días viernes por Acostambo. De esa manera obtiene un dinero extra para el hogar. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “los pinos” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Julia, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en: Julia, 25, and her husband, Juan, have been married for 6 years.  They have a son of their own, Nilver, and a niece, Melina, who they've cared for since her mother died when she was just a baby.  They live in a house they own in the town of Aymara.  Julia has a big heart.  Her greatest virtues are her humility and the love she has for other people.  Even though her niece isn't her own child, she cares for her just as if she was.  Julia is a farmer.  She grows tuber crops common to this area--potatoes, olluco, oca and mashua--on land that she owns.  Spending time on the land is what she likes best, but she also likes going to Huancayo where she sells her crop.  Along with farming, she also raises animals: 6 cows and 48 sheep.  She goes to the market at Acostambo on Fridays, sometimes to sell milk and other times to sell meat.  She uses the income to help support her family.  Julia belongs to the Los Pinos community bank and this is her first MFP loan.  She hopes that you will help her with her plans.  She, in turn, is committed to repaying the loan on time.  She says, too, that she likes her community bank because the members are responsible and supportive.  Your help will allow Julia to buy natural fertilizers for fertilizing her fields.

loans.use: to buy supplies for farming business.

loans.name: Francisco Cesar

texts.es:
Francisco vive con su esposa y tres hijos, es casado, tiene una venta de sorbete al mayoreo y cuenta con un vehículo para la distribución de ello en diferentes pueblos, no tiene un horario establecido para realizar la venta.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería como lo son sorbetes y paletas, esta compra le permitirá aumentar su capital de venta, el cual le ayudara también a aumentar las ganancias económicas.
Su mayor sueño es tener su casa propia y levantar el negocio ya que había decaído.
texts.en:
Francisco is married and lives with his wife and three children.  He sells wholesale sherbet and has a vehicle for distributing his product in different towns.  He doesn't have an established schedule for his sales.
Francisco is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise, such as sherbet and popsicles.  These purchases will increase his business capital, which will help him to increase his profits.
Francisco's greatest dream is to have his own house and to raise up his business, since it had declined.

loans.use: to purchase sherbets and popsicles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve the roof on her house

loans.name: Julia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Miraflor es uno de los municipios mas turísticos del departamento de Estelí, debido a sus tierras fértiles, la riqueza de la flora y fauna que posee, sus habitantes y comunidades aledañas dedicadas alas diferentes actividades propias del campo, justo ahí en la comunidad llamada el Terrero es donde habita Julia, una joven de 27 años de edad, madre de dos hijos de 11 y 10 años de edad respectivamente, casada, con apenas 5 año de primaria aprobado, se dedica a la agricultura , siembra hortalizas y vegetales . 
Cuando inicio con esta actividad fue mediante un préstamo pues el capital que tenia no era suficiente, tenia 17 años de edad, comenzó sembrando cebolla y tomate, después aprendió a criar cerdos para vender. Con EL tiempo fue adquiriendo experiencia ahora también siembra papas y la vende en la ciudad de Estelí junto con su esposo trabajan en conjunto para sembrar y vender los cultivos. Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar abono, semilla , insumos para siembra de papas y comprar cerdos para criar. Ya que con la inversión podrá solventar parte de las necesidades para siembra de la cual no dispone y sacar una muy buena cosecha de papas. Ella die que uno de sus objetivos es dejarle a sus hijos una casa donde vivan honradamente y no tengan que andar rodando de un lugar a otro como les toco vivir a ella , darles estudios para que sea alguien en la vida . En sus planes futuros quiere mejorar el lugar donde esta criando a los cerdos para tenerlo en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Miraflor is one of the municipalities of the department of Estelí most visited by tourists because of its fertile land, its rich flora and fauna, and its inhabitants and communities engaged in a variety of farming activities. 

Julia lives there, in the community of Terrero. She is 27 years old, married, and the mother of two children aged 11 and 10. She completed grade 5 of primary school. She now earns her living by growing vegetables.

She started this job at the age of 17 with a loan as she didn’t have enough capital. She grew onions and tomatoes. Then she learned how to raise pigs and sell them. As time passed she got more experience, and now grows and sells potatoes too in the town of Estelí. She works alongside her husband growing and selling the produce. 

Now Julia needs a loan to buy fertilizer, seeds, and other supplies for the potatoes, and also to buy pigs to raise. With the money she will be able to afford some of these necessities that she lacks and will be able to get a good crop of potatoes.

Julia says that one of her objectives is to provide her children with a house where they can live with dignity so they don’t have to move around from one place to another. She also wants them to be educated so they are someone when they grow up. Her future plans also include the wish to improve the pen where the pigs live so that they have better conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, and other supplies for potatoes, and also to buy pigs to raise

loans.name: Luis Ramon

texts.es:
el sr. Luís Ramón tiene 41 años de edad, esta casado y junto con sus hijos viven en las Vegas de Guambuco Danlí, Luis se ha dedicado durante estos 10 años a la caficultura, junto a su esposa han logrado salir adelante, son personas muy emprendedoras y con deseos de superación, ellos cuentan con 5 manzanas de café, que es su fuente de ingresos por año, con estas ganancias  cubre los gastos familiares y cumple con compromisos adquiridos.
Luis utilizara el credito para la compra de un panel solar, por encontrarse la comunidad en montaña adentro se dificulta poder contar con energía eléctrica,  servicio muy importante para el desarrollo y educación de los pueblos.
texts.en:
Sr. Luís Ramón is 41 years of age.  He is married, and his wife and he live with their children in Las Vegas de Guambuco Danlí.

For 10 years, Luís has been involved in coffee growing.  He and his wife have succeeded in getting ahead.  They are very enterprising people with a desire to excel.  They have 5 “manzanas” (about 8.5 acres) of coffee plants that is their source of annual income.  With these earnings they cover their family expenses and meet their commitments.  

Luís will use the loan to purchase a solar panel.  Since they are located in a mountain community it is difficult to be able to have electric service, which is very important for the development and education of the people.

loans.use: to purchase a solar panel.

loans.name: Sherly

texts.es: Sherly, de 27 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Luis, su esposo desde hace 6 años. Ambos esperan la llegada de su próximo hijo quien tiene 6 meses en la barriguita de su mamá. Y juntos vive en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pilcomayo. Desde joven comenzó a trabajar por si sola. Pues su lema es “progresar”.  Su principal actividad es la venta de comida, en sus inicios tenía un restaurante, donde vendía comida casera. Con el tiempo adquirió un lugar más atractivo, pues se ubicaba en una zona céntrica; ahí comenzó a vender tamales, café, jugos y bebidas diversas. Ella trabaja sin descanso de lunes a domingo sin parar, ya que de esa manera obtendrá buenos resultados. A la par con su crecimiento, afrontó un nuevo reto, se casó y conformo una familia, la que ahora se fortaleza con la llegado de su primer hijo. Luis, aparte de ser un esposo ejemplar es un policía responsable que vela por el bienestar de la sociedad. Su objetivo ahora, es invertir en su restaurante y hacerlo conocido. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Sherly de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de materiales de calidad, para revestir el cuarto de su próximo bebe, “ya le falta poco” menciona.
texts.en: Sherly is 27 years old and is a hardworking woman. She has lived with Luis, her husband, for 6 years. They are both awaiting the arrival of their next child, as she is six months pregnant. They live together in their own home, located in the community of Pilcomayo. Since she was young, she has worked for herself, since her motto is "progress". Her main activity is selling food. At first she had a restaurant where she sold homemade food. Over time she acquired a more attractive place, located in a central area. There she started to sell tamales, coffee, juice and different beverages. She works tirelessly Monday through Sunday without stopping, since that's the only way to get results. As she experienced her growth, she faced a new challenge. She married and joined a family, which gives her strength now that she is awaiting her first child. Luis, besides being an exemplary husband, is a responsible police officer who watches out for society's wellbeing. Her goal now is to invest in her restaurant and make it known. This is her fourth loan with MFP, where she hopes to have your cooperation to cement her plans. She also promises to make her payments on time, as she did with previous loans. She also likes being a part of the association because all of its members are responsible people and very supportive. Upon receiving your help, Sherly will invest the money she has asked for in buying quality materials to remodel her new baby's room. 'It's almost done", she remarks.

loans.use: to improve the infrastructure in her baby's room.

loans.name: Calixtra De Jesus

texts.es: Calixta De Jesús  su actividad es una pulpería. Su negocio está ubicado en su vivienda, en donde la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a solicitarle una gran variedad de productos, Calixta se esfuerza cada día en ofrecer lo mejor en su negocio.  Esta oportunidad surgió por la idea de una amiga que le brindo cierta orientación con este negocio, fue así que decidió comenzar a comprar ciertos productos y llegar a tener su propio negocio. El crédito es para la compra de granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, shampoo, pan y detergentes.
texts.en:
Calixta De Jesús has a grocery store. Her business is located in her home where most of her customers come to ask for various products. 

Calixta strives everyday to do the best she can in her business. This opportunity came about through the idea from a friend who offered her guidance with the business, and so it was that she decided to buy certain products and to have her own business. 

The loan is in order to buy basic grains, soft drinks, candy, shampoo and detergents.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soft drinks, candy, shampoo, bread and detergents

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice and  "bonnie" fish for her business.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es: Verónica, de 37 años es una mujer empeñosa. Vive en compañía de Celestino, sui esposo desde hace 17 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Deysi, Nelson y Kenyi, a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Acocra. Junto a su esposo comparten los gastos del hogar. Pues todos los días se dirigen a sus cultivos de papa de toda variedad, los cuales siembran en terrenos arrendados. Cuenta que entre las variedades de papa están “yungay, muruhuallyo, peruanita” y demás depende al precio de temporada en el mercado. Por otra parte, tienen 8 ovejas y 7 vacas, que le brindan un ingreso adicional a sus ganancias, pues las enseba para luego venderlas a un mayor precio. Además comparte la leche que produce para el alimento de sus hijos. Ahora ellos desean ahorrar lo necesario para los estudios de sus hijos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Jooc sonjolla” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. De recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales y 6 kilos de semilla de maíz para sembrar en sus 2 hectáreas de terreno agrícola.
texts.en:
Verónica is 37 years old and is a tenacious woman. She lives with Celestino, her husband of 17 years. Together they have 3 children named Deysi, Nelson and Kenyi, and they care for them in their own home located in the small village of Acocra. She and her husband share the household expenses.

Every day they manage the many-varied potato crops which they planted on leased land. Among the variety of potatoes are yungay [a yellowish potato] muruhuallyo, and peruanita [bi-color skin] and others. The pricing depends on the season at the market place. In addition, they have 8 sheep and 7 cows which gives them additional profit towards income, greasing them for later resale at a higher price. 

She also shares the milk from the cows with the children. Now they want to save what is needed to pay for the education of their children. 

She belongs to the solidarity group called Jooc Sonjolla and this is the first loan with MFP, and she is hoping for their assistance in order to carry out her plans. In return she promises to make her payments on time, as with loans in the past. 

She likes being a part of the community bank because all the members are trustworthy and very close-knit. When she receives the loan she will use the money to buy natural fertilizers and 6 kilos of corn seed to plan in her 2 hectares of farmland.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer and 6 kilos of corn seed

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es: Alejandra, de 44 años es una mujer seria. Vive en compañía de Bernabé, su esposo hace 20 años. Ambos tienen 9 hijos, pero solo viven con 7 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en el anexo de Acocra. Desde que su esposo comenzó a trabajar en la mina de cobre, su calidad de vida aumento. Ahora no se preocupa por mantener sus sembríos estables y sembrar en gran cantidad. Pero, sabe que ello no durará mucho, por esa razón continúa cuidando de sus cultivos de papa y maíz, los cuales siembra para consumo y si le sobra los vende a los comerciantes mayoristas que visitan su zona constantemente. Paralelo a su trabajo, cuida también de sus vacas y ovejas que enseba para luego venderlas a un mayor precio. En la ganadería está ganando dinero, por eso desea seguir comprando más ganado y así aumentar su capital de trabajo. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Jooc sonjolla” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Alejandra de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa, además de varias cabezas de ganado ovino.
texts.en: Alejandra, age 44, is a serious woman. She lives with Bernabé, her husband of 20 years. Together they have 9 children, only 7 of whom live with them in their own home in the Acocra annex. Their quality of life increased when her husband started working in a copper mine. Now, she doesn't have to worry about maintaining a bountiful and stable harvest--but she knows that this good period won't last long, so she continues to care for her potato and corn crops. She plants them for her family's consumption, and if she has an excess she sells them to the merchants who are always visiting the area. On top of this work, Alexandra also cares for her cows and sheep, which she fattens up so that she can later sell them at a better price. She is making money from working in livestock, so she wants to keep buying more livestock and increase her working capital. She belongs to the "Jooc Sonjolla" solidarity group, and this is her first loan with MFP. She hopes for your collaboration so that she can see her plan to fruition. She promises to repay her quotas on time, as she did with previous loans. She is grateful to be part of this association because all of the members are responsible and very united. Upon receiving your support, Alejandra will invest this loan in the purchase of natural fertilizers for her potato crops. She will also buy several heads of sheep.

loans.use: to buy sheep and bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Isaias

texts.es:
Isaías, de 36 años de edad, soltero, vive en un barrio de Taulabe, Comayagua.
Hace dos años que estableció una pulpería donde vende productos alimenticios de primera necesidad, como ser: arroz, frijoles, pan, azúcar, manteca, harina, pastas, churros, dulces etc. El vive con su madre  quien le apoya mucho para vender. Se motivó a establecer este negocio debido a que en el barrio donde vive no hay otro negocio de estos y así la gente se evita de caminar hasta el otro barrio para comprar.
Ha solicitado este préstamo para surtir de más productos, en compra de arroz, frijoles, manteca, azúcar, sal, harina, etc. De las ganancias tiene el plan de mejorar el local del negocio.
texts.en:
Isaías, 36, is single.  He lives in the Taulabe neighborhood, Comayagua.  He opened a grocery store two years ago where he sells basic staple items like rice, beans, bread, sugar, lard, flour, pastas, snacks, candy, etc.

He lives with his mother who helps him a lot with the sales.  He was motivated to start this business because there is no other like it in his neighborhood and people can avoid having to go to a different neighborhood to buy.

He requests this loan to buy more stock merchandise.  He will buy rice, beans, lard, sugar, salt, flour, etc.  He plans to use profits to make improvements to the store.

loans.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Adan Aurelio

texts.es:
el sr. Adán Aurelio tiene 34 años, esta casado y es padre de 5 hijos, sus dos hijos mayores estudian en la escuela publica de la aldea en donde viven,  Adan se dedica a la caficultura, tiene 5 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, actualmente tiene 1/4 manzana de tierra que es de café cosechera, misma que es la fuente de ingresos para su familia, junto con su esposa han logrado seguir adelante por el esfuerzo y el entusiasmo de los dos, Adán Aurelio tambien se dedica a la venta de palitos de café, los que vende para la temporada de siembra del mismo, realiza sus trabajos de campo con los familiares que conviven con él, por lo tanto los ingresos que le genera este cultivo son ingresos muy rentables.
Adan utilizara el credito para la compra de un panel solar,  por encontrarse la comunidad en montaña adentro se dificulta poder contar con energía eléctrica, gracias a esta planta solar podra mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Adán Aurelio is 34 years old. He is married and the father of 5 children. His two oldest are in the public school in the town where they live. Adan grow coffee. He has been doing this for 5 years. At present, he has about two thirds of an acre for the coffee crop. This is his family's source of income. With his wife, he has been able to get ahead with their hard work and enthusiasm. Adán Aurelio also sells coffee canes during the planting season. He does his work in the fields with relatives who live with hi, so the income he generates is very profitable. 

Adan will use the loan to buy a solar panel. Living in a remote mountain community makes it difficult to be able to count on electric energy. Thanks to this solar plant, he will be able to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy panel.

loans.name: Blanca Maria

texts.es: Blanca, originaria de Estelí, de 33 años de edad, madre soltera, tiene un hijo de 1 año de edad.
